articles.author: Samantha Horton
articles.title: Wienermobiles relish victory in Wienie 500 at Indianapolis Motor Speedway - WFYI
articles.description: Six Oscar Mayer Wienermobiles faced off in the first-ever “Wienie 500,” a hot dog-themed race held on Carb Day at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
articles.content:
The “Wienie 500” may not have broken speed records, but it easily won the title of most delicious spectacle in racing at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway’s Carb Day Friday afternoon.
Six Oscar Mayer … [+2522 chars]

articles.title: SEC announces schedule changes to SEC Baseball Tournament Semifinal Saturday - Southeastern Conference
articles.description: Due to a forecast of inclement weather for Saturday afternoon, Game 13 between Tennessee and Vanderbilt – originally scheduled for noon CT – will now begin Saturday at 10 a.m. CT.
articles.content: Due to a forecast of inclement weather for Saturday afternoon, Game 13 between Tennessee and Vanderbilt originally scheduled for noon CT will now begin Saturday at 10 a.m. CT.

articles.title: Brock Purdy never considered skipping offseason work while waiting on extension - NBC Sports

articles.title: Scottie Scheffler survives Colonial cut despite poor putting and awful closing bogey - NBC Sports
articles.description: Scheffler looked poised to move off the cut line and back into contention at the Charles Schwab Challenge but had a very disappointing finish.
articles.content:
A dismal putting performance and a head-scratching bogey at the last put Scottie Scheffler much closer to a missed cut than the lead at the Charles Schwab Challenge.
